name: Sorcerer's Lil Helpers
description:
Made in 72 hours for Magic Mini Jam.

It is multiplayer (with some expected bugs) so you can technically play with others.

No single player option as I ran out of time. The gameplay is lacking an end goal at the moment but I am really loving how it has come together so far in this short amount of time.

Hope to continue working on this project in the future :)

Credits: Art/Code: Brandon Sovran, Music: Ernie Sicilliano
